My Life

Hey, I'm Samuel!</h1>

I'm a developer and designer, primarily of web from Yorkshire, England

A recent graduate of the University of Hull, working on projects of my own, and of the courses. I tend to post on Instagram frequently, though mainly of my interests, spend my time Cooking, Airsofting and much more. You can find me on LinkedIn


This site has existed for a while, however, was deemed at the end of my dissertation that it was not up to standards acceptable to me, and so an update was required, still in the single page format. As can also be seen the page was much plainer and less complex.
